entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:15 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 6:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 1.4°C
Wind: E 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to a few flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
